column4: whats the easiest way to go about uninstalling an app?  i need to make sure everything is removed...
mark for complete removal in synaptic
that seems to leave stuff behind
and are you sure you did complete removal?
when i tried to remove compiz that way it left config files behind
i need to remove xine, its giving me problems
do you know where those configs are?
yes, i tool care of that problem, im on to another...  after upgrading i have some apps that are acting up
compiz broke, as did xine and audacious
oh, cant forget i lose sound in linux when running an xp host in vbox, didnt have that problem before the upgrade to 8.04 either
for vbox, you have the same problem?
sucks huh, i used to keep the vm running all the time
